msg: Links to Validator now go to the Validator web site, rather than viewcvs.

author: bayard

author: rdonkin
msg: Removed section containing pending proposals. This was hopelessly out of date and is in pratice unmaintainable. The system which seems to have emerged is that projects tend to serve a probation in the sandbox and are then promoted (or not) so this section wasn't very useful anyway.
